contentrichtext.text: {{For|those of a similar name|Christian Wolff (disambiguation)}} {{BLP sources|date=January 2011}} {{Notability|date=November 2008}} '''Christian Wolf''' is a designer of [[board games]]. He has won the [[As d'Or]] for [[Tutankhamen (board game)|''Tutankhamen'']] and the [[Kinderspiel des Jahres]] for [[Klondike (board game)|''Klondike'']] in 2001;<ref>{{cite web|title=Ausgezeichnete Spiele 2001|language=German|url=http://www.spiel-des-jahres.com/cms/front_content.php?idcatart=156&lang=1&client=1|publisher=[[Spiel des Jahres]]|accessdate=18 January 2011}}</ref> both were collaborations with [[Stefanie Rohner]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Wolf, Christian | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Board game designer | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Wolf, Christian}} [[Category:Board game designers]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Board-game-stub}}
